59

A  When is your trip to Canada?

B  Next week.

A  Why are you going?

B  To visit the sales offices. I'm going to visit Toronto first to see the sales reps there.

A  Great. Are you going to Vancouver as well?

B  No, I'm not going to have time. But I'm going to spend a day in Quebec to present the new product to Dominic and his team.

A  Oh! Quebec is beautiful.

B  Yes, I think we're going out in the evening to see the old city and have dinner.

A  When are you coming back?

B  On Thursday, but I'm going to take Friday off to have a nice long weekend.

A  Good idea!
